snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio announced that new identification cards will arrive with a bonus: offers of free admission or discounts at 33 of the city’s leading cultural institutions.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio announces that new municipal identification cards will include free admission or discounts at 33 of city's leading cultural institutions; incentives are meant to encourage cultural activity among immigrants and other New Yorkers who may feel they cannot afford to visit places like the symphony or ballet.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and ROBIN POGREBIN

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio announced that new identification cards will arrive with a bonus: offers of free admission or discounts at 33 of the city’s leading cultural institutions.

headline.main: New York City ID Cards Coming With Cultural Benefits
headline.print_headline: City’s New ID Cards Will Include Cultural Benefits

keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations
